trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SEQ_00<tab>This Starlight Celebration volunteer is beaming at you. At least, you think so─their face is difficult to discern through such mighty facial hair. ※This quest is available for a limited time only.

TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SEQ_01<tab>The bearded volunteer who greets you is Amh Garanjy, Starlight celebrant and expert of all things both wintery and cheerful. This year, the Starlight festivities are honoring the Saint of Nymeia with special recreations of his classic garments─most prominently, his glorious red coat and great, big, bushy beard. Such a visage is sure to bring delight to any youngling, but it seems there is at least one lad who cannot agree, as he stares longingly at the festive merriment before fleeing to locations unknown. Saulinne, a young lady worried for his happiness, petitions your assistance, which you happily provide by questioning Gridania's residents for further details on this mysterious moper.
※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SEQ_02<tab>Weaving your way through crowds of citizens and sightseers, you question a number of children and an on-duty Wailer to yield the information you need. Now all that's left is to tell Saulinne of wayward Tenny's whereabouts.

TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SEQ_03<tab>Saulinne wastes no time in heading straight for the Greatloam Growery as soon as she hears what you have to say. You follow her, resisting the urge to tweak the carrot nose of a snowman along the way.

TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SEQ_04<tab>Upon speaking with him, Tenny's melancholy takes shape─his father was relocated to Gridania for work, and this is his first Starlight away from his friends in Ul'dah. You determine that the most realistic solution to his problem is mailing gifts to said friends─a decision enthusiastically supported by a particularly iconic Saint of Nymeia who boasts superior crafting skills and flawless facial hair. Saulinne pledges her assistance as well, and so it is that you are enlisted as the official courier for Tenny's gifts. Your first task is delivering an update to Amh Garanjy whilst the Saint of Nymeia instructs the eager younglings in the art of handicrafts.

TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SEQ_05<tab>Upon hearing that you have been volunteered to deliver gifts, Amh Garanjy cheerfully volunteers you to wear a Saint of Nymeia outfit while you do so. You accept the proffered bundle of red cloth, unable to reject the joyful look of anticipation on her face and wondering what fantastical world of Starlight awaits you beyond the beard...
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TODO_00<tab>Gather information near the Whistling Miller.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Saulinne.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Tenny.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Amh Garanjy.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_000<tab>If it isn't my favorite adventurer! You do remember me, don't you?
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_001<tab>Pardon me, are you an adventurer? Allow me to introduce myself, I am...er...
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_002<tab>...Perhaps I should remove my beard.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_003<tab>Much better! Starlight celebrant Amh Garanjy, at your service. I am ever so pleased to meet you during this most sacrosanct of seasons.

TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_100_003<tab>In commemoration of the Ishgardian knights who once sheltered needy orphans from the cold, we strive to deliver joy and comfort to all younglings each Starlight Celebration.

TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_004<tab>This year, we pay particular tribute to the figure at the heart of Starlight legend─the snowy-bearded captain dubbed the Saint of Nymeia. As you can see, we have commissioned replicas of his red coat and fluffy white beard.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_005<tab>How better to delight the children than by distributing presents as the saint himself, after all!
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_006<tab>So far, we have been successful in spreading Starlight cheer. However...
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_007<tab>It seems there is a particular youngling who finds our felicitous festivities distressing.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_008<tab>Were I free to wander, I would reach out to them myself and provide what aid I could. Alas, my duties as celebrant require my attendance here.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_009<tab>Might you assist this child in my stead? I am sure they would welcome the insights of an adventurer such as yourself.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_010<tab>I am most grateful. Let me summon the young lady who first brought this matter to my attention.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_011<tab>Hello! My name is Saulinne. It's nice to meet you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_012<tab>As I told Miss Garanjy, I've seen a boy around here who...
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_013<tab>...Oh! Look, there he is! Over there!
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_100_013<tab>...I guess he didn't come to play this time either.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_014<tab>That boy's been watching the stage from a distance ever since preparations began.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_015<tab>At first, I thought he must be excited about the Starlight Celebration, but he always looks so sad! That's why I thought I'd try inviting him to play...
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_016<tab>But when I called out to him, he just ran away.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_017<tab>Comforting others when they are troubled is a very kind thing to do. You did well to try, Saulinne.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_018<tab>I just think nobody should be alone during the Starlight Celebration!
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_019<tab>He keeps coming back, so I'm sure there's something he's worried about. Maybe he's too shy to ask for a present...?
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_020<tab>Either way, I'm worried about him. Would you help me make sure he's okay, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>?
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_021<tab>Then I'll leave this matter in your capable hands. I believe the boy ran off towards the Whistling Miller. Perhaps someone there knows more about him.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_022<tab>Let's ask around! Please tell me if you learn anything, and I'll be sure to do the same.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_025<tab>I believe he headed for the Whistling Miller. Perhaps someone saw him run by?
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_026<tab>I haven't found him yet, but I'll keep asking. Tell me if you learn anything!
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_BOY04781_000_030<tab>Oh, you must mean Tenny. I heard he moved here from Ul'dah recently.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_BOY04781_000_031<tab>Can't tell you much more than that. He makes a point of keeping to himself.

TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_GIRL04781_000_032<tab>That boy who always comes to stare at the decorations? I know him! Er, I mean, I've seen him around before. I don't know his name. And I don't think I've ever seen him smile...
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_WOODWAILER04781_000_033<tab>A boy? Yes, ran straight past me towards the Greatloam Growery.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_BOY04781_000_035<tab>We'd be happy to play with him, of course. But Tenny never seems keen on it.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_GIRL04781_000_036<tab>Why does he always look so sad? It's the Starlight Celebration! Maybe he didn't like his present...
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_WOODWAILER04781_000_037<tab>Straight towards the Greatloam Growery, like I said. Has he been up to mischief?
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_038<tab>I hope you and Saulinne find the boy soon. Perhaps someone in the area can help guide you to him.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_040<tab>Did you learn anything?
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_041<tab>So his name is Tenny...
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_042<tab>Well, what are we waiting for? Let's go to the Greatloam Growery!
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_045<tab>Hello, Tenny!
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TENNY_000_050<tab>Wh-Who are you? Some kind of adventurer?
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_051<tab><var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> is! And my name is Saulinne. You were at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre earlier, weren't you?
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_052<tab>Would you like to go and join the Starlight Celebration with me? My friends will be there too, so we can all play together!
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TENNY_000_053<tab>Your friends...
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_054<tab>They're really nice! ...Do you not want to?
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TENNY_000_055<tab>It's not that. It's...it's a long story.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_056<tab>I have time!

TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TENNY_000_057<tab>...We just moved here for my father's job. And I know there's no point in moping about it, but I really, <var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> miss my three friends back in Ul'dah.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TENNY_000_058<tab>During Starlight, we'd show each other what toys we got and eat too many sweets and find all the best decorations in the city.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TENNY_000_059<tab>We'd have so much fun! And each time we'd promise to play together the next year. But now...
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_060<tab>...You're all the way in Gridania.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TENNY_000_061<tab>I used to love the Starlight Celebration, but now all I can think about is leaving my friends behind and betraying our promise.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_062<tab>I'm sorry. I hope I didn't hurt your feelings by asking you to play...
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TENNY_000_063<tab>It's all right. You didn't know.

TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_064<tab>But Tenny, doesn't this mean you'll <var 1A 02 /var>never<var 1A 01 /var> be able to enjoy the Starlight Celebration without feeling guilty? There must be something we can do...
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_065<tab><var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Mister)) /var>! You're a grown-up─what do you think?
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you suggest?
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_A1_000_000<tab>Sounds like something that three tickets to Gridania could fix.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_A1_000_001<tab>Nothing screams “Friendship, kupo!” like moogle mail.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_A1_000_002<tab>Pack your bags, kid─I'm smuggling you back to Ul'dah.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TENNY_000_066<tab>I guess. But Ul'dah is so far away. That sort of journey is a lot to ask...
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TENNY_000_067<tab>Mail...
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TENNY_000_068<tab>That's it! I could send them presents!

TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TENNY_000_069<tab>Wh-What!? There's no way my father would allow─wait, did you say <var 1A 02 /var>smuggle<var 1A 01 /var>? ...Thanks for the offer, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>, but I'll pass.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_070<tab>That's a lovely idea! Everyone loves getting packages. And that way you'll be celebrating together─at a distance!
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TENNY_000_071<tab>What should I give them? Something you can only get in Gridania...?
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_GODBERT_000_072<tab>(-???-)Ho ho ho! The answer to that is simple.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TENNY_000_073<tab>That snowy white beard─th-that's the real thing! You're the Saint of Nymeia, aren't you!?

TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_GODBERT_000_074<tab>(-Saint of Nymeia-)Quite! Young Tenny, you need look no further than your own two hands─for presents crafted <var 1A 02 /var>from<var 1A 01 /var> the heart are presents <var 1A 02 /var>full<var 1A 01 /var> of heart. I shall rigorously assist you in every step of their creation as both an artisanal saint and saintly artisan!
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TENNY_000_075<tab>...I don't really understand, but thank you?
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_SAULINNE_000_076<tab>I'll help too! That way your presents will be crafted in half the time.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_TENNY_000_077<tab>Really? A-All right, then. Thanks.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_GODBERT_000_078<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> Adventurer! Might we rely upon you to deliver Tenny's gifts once they are prepared?
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_GODBERT_000_079<tab>Though we could post them by more conventional moogles, a child's hard work and dedication ought to be hand-delivered by only the most trusted individual.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_GODBERT_000_080<tab>And as you are both emotionally invested in Tenny's happiness and currently standing before me, I bequeath the task to you. You will do it, yes?
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_GODBERT_000_081<tab>Excellent. Then we shall realize these creations ere the Spinner sloshes Her nog. In the meantime, I would have you apprise Amh Garanjy of our efforts.
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_GODBERT_000_082<tab>Once you have relayed your report, return here for the requisite packages. Chop-chop!
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_090<tab>Welcome back! Were you able to speak with the boy?
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_091<tab>I see. To be separated from one's friends is heartbreaking, indeed. I only wish I too could help in some way...
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_092<tab>...Oh! I know just the thing─I shall transform you into a saint!
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_093<tab>I have a Saint of Nymeia costume that I would be most happy to gift you. Tenny's friends will be delighted for a visit from the Spinner's anointed herald!
TEXT_FESXMS901_04781_AMHGARANJY_000_094<tab>Accept this with my warmest wishes, dear adventurer─I know you won't let us down!
